nodes.text: A temple was located on the planet Ontotho. The temple was home to statues depicting the sentient Zeffo species. At some point, Jedi Master Eno Cordova and his Padawan Cere Junda were sent by the Jedi High Council to oversee the temple's excavation. Cordova's interaction with the temple and its Zeffo ruins eventually led him to become obsessed with researching the Zeffo, their technology, and their history.
